page.title: 07DAILY LIFE OF A SISTER
page.content: The Sisters of St Francis Convent rise at 5:00 a.m.At 5:30 a.m.they go to the chapel to say their own prayers The sisters that teach then prepare lessons or mark school books.At 6:30 a.m. there is quiet prayer and medit- ation followed by morning prayer,read- ings and psalms.The sisters come to- gether for Mass at 7:20a.m.Afterwards they have breakfast and go to school.3 teach all day,one in reception and two in the juniors.Straight after school the sisters have tea followed by even- ing prayer,private prayer and spirit- ual readings.Then there's time for shopping,gardening and teaching prep- arations.At 7:30 p.m.the evening meal is served then night-time and private prayer are said.8.p.m.is time for re- creational activities-games,sewing and watching T.V.Finally around 10 p.m. it is bedtime for most sisters.
